base_description: White spherical object on a three-legged stand.
part_description: Consists of a white sphere supported by three ornate legs, with a circular base and a golden ring encircling the sphere.
internal_interaction_description: The sphere is held in place by the golden ring, which is attached to the top of the stand. The three legs provide stability and are evenly spaced around the circular base, ensuring the sphere remains elevated and centered.
external_interaction_description: The object can be interacted with by rotating the sphere within the golden ring. It serves as a decorative piece or educational tool, potentially used in settings like classrooms or libraries to demonstrate planetary motion or as a globe.
